result.execSummary:
The defendant Dillon Leroy Shirilla was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant to provide a DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: 08CF61 added to DE's current PPlan on 16CM117 per DE's request/inquiry on 9-01-16.  DE to pay $25/mo comm 9-03-16.  Includes 08CF61, 16CM117. jaf

DE called to inquire about the details of his Pplan.  DE was advised that his Pplan of $25/mo starts 8-03-16 & is due the 3rd of ea mo until pd in full, which his bal as of today is $208.00.  DE was advised of WA Fees & Interest if pymts are missed. jaf
Def's copy of JOC returned from PO; Not deliverable as addressed. km

CO: EFV for SRN, Rept: Gross, Clerk: Minot,ADA:   Matthew L Hartung   DF ATTY:  Joseph Robert Caton   DF:  Dillon Leroy Shirilla appeared from jail. Case called at 1:35 pm. Court reviews file. Atty Caton updates the court. There is an agreement. Recess. ADA Hartung requests for charge to be amended without repeater.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights.  Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to amended charge. Court questions Defendant.  Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights.  Attorneys stipulate to facts.  Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts.  Court finds Defendant Guilty to charge without repeater. Quash Warrant. Court orders:
 - 5 Days Jail. Credit for time served
- Court Costs $243.00
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200.00
Defendant sign payment plan

Filed by ADA Correll. km

Court Orders $250 cash bond paid by 2/26/16, DEF to be released today. Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 8, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
